alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Rains; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockwall, southern Hunt and northwestern Rains Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Royse City, or 11 miles east of Rockwall, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Royse City, Fate, West Tawakoni, Quinlan, Caddo Mills, East Tawakoni, Point, Campbell, Hawk Cove, Greenville Club Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Lone Oak, Union Valley, Cash, Center Point, Hermits Cove and Dixon. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 75 and 91, and between mile markers 103 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Texas.
